name: HTML5
description: HTML5 (Hypertext Markup Language 5) is a markup language used for structuring and presenting hypertext documents on the World Wide Web.

name: CSS3
description: A style sheet language used for describing the presentation of a document written in HTML or XML.

name: JavaScript
description: JavaScript, also known as JS, is a scripting or programming language that adds interactivity to web pages, apps, and games.

name: Node.js
description: A JavaScript runtime built on Chrome's V8 JavaScript engine.

name: React
description: A JavaScript library for building user interfaces.
